name: @camunda8/sap-btp-plugin
description: mono repo for the Camunda BTP plugin, part of the SAP Integration

scripts.//start:hybrid: authN and authZ against BTP xsuaa with the help of cds bind
scripts.//start:local: no authN and auth - dev-approuter also starts the backend - make sure to also set 'authenticationMethod' to 'none' in xs-dev.json
scripts.//hybrid:xs-app: this is needed for destination resolution
scripts.hybrid:xs-app: cp router/xs-app.json router/xs-app.json.orig; cp router/xs-app-hybrid.json router/xs-app.json
scripts.local:app: npm run -w core _deploy:sqlite; npm run start:local -w fiori-app
